WebDriver Locators

Nov 7, 2017

Locators are used to find and match elements on a web page. Therefore locators are one of the most important section in test automation. Using correct locator ensure fast execution and easy maintenance of tests.

Sometimes you can find are very straight forward locators to locate elements, like id, name. But some times itâ€™s very hard to find such straightforward locators, for those cases we need to find more customized locators like customized xpaths.

So let's discuss about Selenium locators today,

What are the locators used in Selenium?

Following are the locators available in Selenium.

  • Id
  • Name
  • Css locator
  • xpath
  • linkText
  • partialLinkText
  • tagName
  • className

Let's discuss about these locators one by one.
